page.title: 03Peoples shopping habits
page.content: Most people shop in Warcop, mainly for their food.The shops are close by and easy to get to.But people in our area also shop in Brough (4 miles),Kirkby Stephen (5 miles),Appleby (5 miles), Penrith (18 miles),Carlisle (36 miles) and occasionally some people visit Edinburgh,Glasgow or London.People shop in other villages and towns for clothes,hardware,toys and food, because none of the shops in Warcop sell clothes, toys or hardware.There is only one bus sevice per week travelling to Appleby,so transport has to be arranged.We found that many people shopped at Penrith and Carlisle rather than Appleby and Kirkby Stephen,perhaps because the larger towns give more choice.
